game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits who have been raiding their supplies. The villagers are in dire need of someone to deal with the problem.
game.objective: Eliminate the bandit threat and return to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces, a potion of healing, and the gratitude of the villagers.

tasks.description: Gather information about the bandits' hideout from the villagers.
tasks.objective: Talk to at least three villagers to gather information.

tasks.description: Scout out the bandits' hideout and determine their numbers and movements.
tasks.location: Bandit Hideout (located in a nearby forest)
tasks.objective: Observe the bandits without being detected.

tasks.description: Launch a surprise attack on the bandits and eliminate the threat.
tasks.location: Bandit Hideout (located in a nearby forest)
tasks.objective: Defeat the bandits' leader and at least five other bandits.

game.title: The Bandit Menace
